Text:
I forgot to say!! Every time you start the app, it will say there is a newer version in Play Store. There isn't. Google has NO PORN policy. Just press (maybe later) and you're in.
Also! To bypass the adds in full screen, click on (use external viewer) button! I personally use mxplayer for streaming.
Hit the like button when you get a chance.
